New Records: Rohit Sharma is set to surpass the 500-run mark in T20Is against Bangladesh
Key Match Events: Hitman Rohit Sharma surpassing the 500-run mark in T20Is against Bangladesh
Jasprit Bumrah weaving his magic again
Pre-Game Insights: India has a head-to-head record of 12/1 against Bangladesh
The momentum is in India's favor after a 47-run victory over AFG
Rohit Sharma (454 runs) and Yuzvendra Chahal (9 wickets) are leading the charge for India
Miscellaneous Highlights: A Super Saturday is on the cards for the Indian cricket fans
The fixture is at the Sir Vivian Richards Stadium, North Sound, Antigua
Others: India: Rohit Sharma (captain), Hardik Pandya (vice-captain), Yashasvi Jaiswal, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, Rishabh Pant, Sanju Samson, Shivam Dube, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Yuzvendra Chahal, Arshdeep Singh, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj

Bangladesh: Najmul Hossain Shanto (captain), Taskin Ahmed, Litton Das, Soumya Sarkar, Tanzid Hasan, Shakib Al Hasan, Towhid Hridoy, Mohammad Mahmudullah, Jaker Ali, Tanvir Islam, Mahedi Hasan, Rishad Hossain, Mustafizur Rahman, Shoriful Islam, Tanzim Hasan Sakib
